verses.name: Psalms 88:1
verses.text: O Lord God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before thee:

verses.name: Psalms 88:2
verses.text: Let my prayer come before thee: incline thine ear unto my cry;

verses.name: Psalms 88:3
verses.text: For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.

verses.name: Psalms 88:4
verses.text: I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man that hath no strength:

verses.name: Psalms 88:5
verses.text: Free among the dead, like the slain that lie in the grave, whom thou rememberest no more: and they are cut off from thy hand.

verses.name: Psalms 88:6
verses.text: Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, in darkness, in the deeps.
